method.text: Melt the butter in a frying pan. Add the leek and garlic and saute together for 3-5 min or until softened. Remove from the heat and leave to cool slightly.
Transfer the cooked leek mixture to a large bowl. Stir in the cashew nuts, breadcrumbs, cheese, Worcestershire sauce, tomato puree, parsley, seasoning and enough egg to bind together.
Using lightly floured hands, divide the mixture into equal portions and shape each into a burger shape. Alternatively, if you have one, use a burger press to make the burgers. Chill for 30 min.
Preheat grill to medium. Grill the burgers for 3-5 min on each side or until golden brown and cooked through. Serve immediately .
